about_the_game:
Please wishlist and follow Strange Antiquities to stay up-to-date with the development and help us spread the word.

Taking place several years after the events of Strange Horticulture, Strange Antiquities is a new dark and cosy adventure set in the world of Undermere. It's a place of ancient woodland, candle-lit libraries, and macabre folklore, where strange things happen as often as it rains.

You are tasked with running a shop dealing in occult antiquities. Hunt down and identify powerful objects and arcane artefacts, and use them to assist the residents of Undermere with their curious and unusual problems.

Prepare for a new adventure, filled with more mystery, puzzles, and dark twists and turns.

You don’t need to have played Strange Horticulture to enjoy Strange Antiquities, but if you haven’t yet, what are you waiting for!?

When hundreds of ravens start circling over the town of Undermere, those in the know become concerned. Occult Scholar Verona Green comes to the shop hoping to discuss the matter with Eli White - Thaumaturge and owner of Strange Antiquities. But before she is able to meet with him, events take a sinister turn…

We are two brothers from the UK who have been making games together for over a decade. In 2022 we released our occult puzzle game Strange Horticulture, and the response has been incredible; from amazing reviews and award nominations to appearing in numerous best-of-the-year lists. Most importantly, it has been a joy to read the kind words left by so many of our players on Steam, where we are still rated Overwhelmingly Positive after almost 10,000 reviews!

We want to thank everyone who has played Strange Horticulture, left us a review, told their friends, or supported the game in any way. It has been an amazing journey and we can't wait to share the next chapter with you.

Many thanks,

Rob & John

name: Strange Antiquities

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: i3 10100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Become the custodian of a store dealing in occult antiquities. Explore the quaint and gloomy town of Undermere, where strange goings-on and dark mysteries abound. Find and identify arcane artefacts, use your collection to aid the townsfolk with their unusual problems — and remember to pet your cat!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
